name: long_stats_slopes
description: Computes slopes of statistics in a longitudinal study for each subject from processed results, outputting to designated directories for further analysis.

inputs.name: QDEC Table File
inputs.description: QDEC table file specifying the subjects and time points.

inputs.name: Stats File
inputs.description: The stats file, e.g. aseg.stats or lh.aparc.stats.

inputs.name: Measure
inputs.description: The stats measure (e.g. volume, thickness, mean, std).

inputs.name: Subjects Directory
inputs.description: Full path to FreeSurfer subjects directory.

inputs.name: Compute Temporal Average
inputs.description: Compute and output the temporal average.

inputs.name: Compute Rate
inputs.description: Compute and output the rate.

inputs.name: Compute Percent Change (Fit)
inputs.description: Compute and output the percent change with respect to tp1 from linear fit.

inputs.name: Compute Percent Change
inputs.description: Compute and output the percent change with respect to tp1.

inputs.name: Compute Symmetric Percent Change
inputs.description: Compute and output the symmetric percent change with respect to temporal average.

inputs.name: Compute Time Series
inputs.description: Compute and output tables showing the time series (row per time point).

inputs.name: Residual Timepoint
inputs.description: Residual timepoint to export (pass 1 for tp1, etc., pass 0 for average).

inputs.name: Time Variable
inputs.description: Variable name for time column variable (e.g., age) in QDEC table.

inputs.name: Generic Time
inputs.description: Time points are ordered in QDEC file; assume time=1,2,3...

inputs.name: Cross-Sectional Results
inputs.description: Use cross-sectional results (for testing only).

inputs.name: Output Temporal Average
inputs.description: Filename to store temporal average in <template>/stats/<OUT_AVG>.

inputs.name: Output Rate
inputs.description: Filename to store rate in <template>/stats/<OUT_RATE>.

inputs.name: Output Percent Change (Fit)
inputs.description: Filename to store percent change to tp1fit in <template>/stats/<OUT_PC1FIT>.

inputs.name: Output Percent Change
inputs.description: Filename to store percent change to tp1 in <template>/stats/<OUT_PC1>.

inputs.name: Output Symmetric Percent Change
inputs.description: Filename to store symmetric percent change in <template>/stats/<OUT_SPC>.

inputs.name: Output Residual
inputs.description: Filename to store residual in <template>/stats/<OUT_RESID>.

inputs.name: Output Stacked Measures
inputs.description: Filename to store stacked measure file in <template>/stats/<OUT_STACK>.

inputs.name: Stacked Temporal Average
inputs.description: Full filename to stack temporal average tables.

inputs.name: Stacked Rate Tables
inputs.description: Full filename to stack rate tables.

inputs.name: Stacked Percent Change (Fit)
inputs.description: Full filename to stack percent change to tp1fit tables.

inputs.name: Stacked Percent Change
inputs.description: Full filename to stack percent change to tp1 tables.

inputs.name: Stacked Symmetric Percent Change
inputs.description: Full filename to stack symmetric percent change tables.

inputs.name: Stacked Residual Tables
inputs.description: Full filename to stack residual tables.

author: FreeSurfer Developers
